eventName: Such is the Joy of Our Reunion
storyInfo: Blaze rescues Mo Bufu from the fire, who turns out to be the witness Leizi is after. Just as Leizi seeks to question him, Chen Che of the Judicial Review Office arrives with her force, putting the whole place under lockdown.

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What even—
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Flames burst forth above their heads, raining cinders down from the ceiling, igniting the flour and oil atop the stove. In an instant, the kitchen is a sea of fire.
*cough* *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: You... go... I'll be fine!
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Cover your mouth and nose! Don't talk!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm not too good with this move yet... let's give it a try.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: 'Scuse me, just duck.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze grabs a knife, then slices her palm open. Gradually a whirlwind forms in Blaze's hand, then expands straight outward into a blast wave.
The violent surge of air sweeps the whole room. In a blink, she's put the fires out, and strewn the cookware about in shambles.
What a skill you have... Could you be...
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: ...Duoxie.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu
Blaze
attributes.content: You're welcome—

attributes.name: Blaze
attributes.content: Hm?
Looking up again, Blaze sees the lamp's frame is charred black, red-hot metal peeking through the burnt coating. It's on the verge of falling.
Mo Bufu, move!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze grabs the old man's arm, trying to pull him to one side, but the lamp's already falling—
With a stifled crack of thunder, the remains of the fixture are abruptly flung to one side, and smashed hard against the wall.
Are you alright there?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Leizi?! What are YOU doing here?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Maybe I should ask, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: But we can talk about you later...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Could this be a repeat of the Ding Feng Lou fire last month...?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan scans her surroundings. The kitchen chefs are in a frenzied jumble, but her gaze quickly locks onto a masked figure among them.
...Who seems to meet her gaze, then turns and vanishes into the crowd.
Blaze, stay here! Keep Mo Bufu safe!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Hey! Where are you going?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... Jeez, this smoke is killing me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: *cough* *hack*... On that pillar there, there's a breaker...
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: There's, uh... a lot of them here... Which one do I pull...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Flitting like a fowl, Lin Qingyan has her target cornered in just a few spry leaps.
Mere meters separate them, but so smoky is the air that she can't quite make out their silhouette.
Just as he makes to run again, a thunderclap strikes next to his feet.
Hold it!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Move another inch, and the next bolt is hitting your head.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Answer my questions.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Why set fire to Ding Feng Lou? Is your target Mo Bufu, or someone else?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: All the previous incidents, they were your doing too, weren't they?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Also... the scrollery?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You... and your accomplices, must have some aim in all these actions—what is it?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Not talking? Then I'll take you back to the Judicial Review Office, for a nice long questioning—
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Deputy Minister Lin, surely you wouldn't ask if you didn't know the answer already?
attributes.name: Masked Individual

attributes.content: Can you not see the truth, or do you simply pretend you can't because you don't dare to?
attributes.name: Masked Individual

attributes.content: What—
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The Office is a good place, but I don't plan on visiting it for now.
attributes.name: Masked Individual

attributes.content: Besides, when your will wavers, the thunder you throw isn't so frightening.
attributes.name: Masked Individual

attributes.content: It's time you opened your eyes.
attributes.name: Masked Individual

attributes.content: Wait—
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: And with that, the masked figure is on the move. Just as Lin Qingyan would give chase, the ceiling sprinklers start up out of nowhere.
Ice-cold water pours down, soaking her head to foot.
Leizi—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You alright?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Dammit.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The customers are all safely out of the way, there's just a few in shock. Thank goodness no one was injured...
attributes.name: Flustered Chef

attributes.content: We've reported it to the authorities. The mandarins should be here any moment...
attributes.name: Flustered Chef

attributes.content: Don't we have a mandarin here already?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Head Chef... you're...
attributes.name: Flustered Chef

attributes.content: I'm fine... I owe it to this girl.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: There's nothing left for you to do here. Go on, go home.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Once the chefs leave, Lin Qingyan locks the door to the room.
Mr. Mo, if I could have a word or two with you.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You know this girl, madam?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: She's a friend of mine.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Chef Mo, she's on the trail of a really important case. Would it be alright if you, uh, tried to answer her questions...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hmph... I don't like what the mandarins get up to, but I don't like to spurn a favor either. You saved my life today, and that's more favor than I'll ever repay.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Go ahead, then. Ask away.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: I'm looking for one of your restaurant's chefs. He's a witness in a case.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I believe ten years ago, he was working in the Ministry of Justice death row prison, making last meals for convicts.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: A chef who only makes last meals... How exactly did he pass the Ding Feng Lou exams?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ding Feng Lou serves all manner of mandarins every year at the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies. That means every chef's background must be clear as day for the record.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I imagine he shouldn't be hard to find.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What exactly do you want me to say, madam?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: First my restaurant catches fire for no reason. Now you say we have a chef who made meals for dead men. Should I even bother to open Ding Feng Lou again?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: I understand your situation, sir. That's why I'm choosing to ask you these things in private.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Whatever. It's not like I can't admit to my own past.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: The chef you're looking for, the death row caterer Mo Xiaoliu, that was me.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I thought so...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: And making last meals is nothing shameful. The powerful need to eat, and so do the powerless.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: My cooking skills come from that prison, making last meals for death row convicts from all corners of the country.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: As for changing my name and hiding my identity, I just didn't want to make any trouble for this restaurant.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: I'm beginning to... sort of admire you.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Do you remember, ten years ago, a convict admitted to the prison by the name of Gu Quan?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: If you don't remember the name, you should at least remember that some decades ago, he was the one and only person to be released from death row.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Wait! You mean my dad? Why'd my dad get the death penalty?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You mean Gu Quan? He was your father?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So you remember him...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I do... all too well.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: I spent so many years in there making last meals. I met countless horrific scoundrels, endless connivers. As each one of them ate before they left, the look in their eyes, it was always more or less the same.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: But I'd never seen someone whose eyes were so clear, so clean, so free of anything.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: He wasn't like the other convicts. In his time, he never wept, never howled, and never screamed injustice, not even on the day he was imprisoned.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Even I found it strange how a man like him could end up on death row.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Why would... my dad...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Then do you know, at the time, what charges Gu Quan was sentenced to death on?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Not at the time...
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Not at the time?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: But one year later, when I joined Ding Feng Lou and began taking part in the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies, I came across a menu for a Feast from a few years before—
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: That was when I learned that at that Feast, Gu Quan served a dish to the True Lung. It just so happens, that was the same dish this girl pulled down earlier. 'Medley of Whites'.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: But next to that dish, he placed a steamed flour bun, and in it... was a filling of red pickled tofu.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: So... what does it mean? Why would he get locked up just for serving that?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan, aren't you gonna say anything?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Your relative told you the story of the Grand Preceptor, but never told you her eventual fate?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Her... fate?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Forty years ago, the Grand Preceptor plotted to assassinate the True Lung. She committed suicide after it failed. Every single one of her underlings was arrested and trialed, and their numbers were over a thousand...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: When Gu Quan served that dish at the Feast, it signified redressing her for her treason. It made the True Lung furious.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: No way... my dad told me so many times, the Grand Preceptor was loyal to the country, the people, the whole realm! How the hell could she be a traitor?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The history books have it that way, yes.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: And they're right?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan, if everything written in them is true, what the hell are you investigating?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: And... and besides, my dad didn't actually get killed, right? Doesn't that prove, like, at least some people from the court believed the Grand Preceptor and my dad were both innocent?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That's a sticking point, yes. If Gu Quan was imprisoned as part of the Grand Preceptor case, why would they free him afterwards?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: It stuck with me too... You see, after entering prison, Gu Quan had two visitors, and both were people I happened to know...
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: One was the person delivering his meal. Yu Cheng, deputy minister of the Office at the time.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: And the other was the one who brought him out... former Minister of Rites, Ning Shu.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: What...?!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Quick! This way! Surround the place immediately!
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: Dammit... why now...?!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What a coincidence. One step ahead of me, Deputy Minister Lin.
attributes.name: Chen Che

attributes.content: I'd just arrived. A coincidence, indeed.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The Judicial Review Office is investigating the Ding Feng Lou fire. I ask all of you to be cooperative.
attributes.name: Chen Che

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan, and the girl next to you, come with me.
attributes.name: Chen Che
